file_content.text: We got your signal loud and clear, Sith. This thing's insane. There're measures in dimensions we didn't know existed.
It's like those Rakata freaks were taking existing species and picking and choosing useful parts. Modular life-form adaptation. You can't make this stuff up.
Your Darth wasn't after medicine. He was after mutation.
What kind of mutation?
Interesting.
Can't say. This device doesn't have data on Force-sensitive species. There must be another one of these around somewhere.
Darth Iratus was trying to control his power. You can't manipulate Force sensitivity biologically.
How does that work?
Who knows what the Rakata were capable of.
The things I do for power.
Yuck.
I'm trying the best I can, but there aren't words for half the stuff I'm seeing.
Boss. This thing's sending some kind of signal.
Grokan. Jack me a satellite and trace it. Let's follow this boy home.
Hutt's warts. This thing's huge. Like some kind of Rakata superhub. And it's still running! This has to be the thing you're looking for.
Then let's move.
If you're wrong about this, I'll come kill you personally.
You'd better be right.
What else could it be? Your diagrams confirm it. What you're holding is a piece of the whole, and this thing is the whole.
What do you mean it's running? What is it?
It's running?
Ancient alien supercomputer. But don't let its age fool you. It's larger than anything modern and a million times as powerful.
Lemme see... looks like, blast. Quarantine zone. The air in that place is deadly. Hold on, we'll try to get you a security override.
But be careful. If that crazy alien machine thing's running, someone had to start it up.
What's this? Another Sith in search of the heart of Belsavis? Turn back. You have been warned. I am watching.
People who try to intimidate me have an appalling mortality rate.
Empty threats.
Who exactly is watching?
Who are you?
You're the Sith that came here before me, aren't you?
Darth Iratus?
Say no more. You have been warned.
Lemme see... looks like, blast. Quarantine zone. The air in that place is deadly. Guards in the area should have breathing masks. Wouldn't go in without one.
